body_html:
@cpuhrsch sure, this definitely works! Actually we have finished most of coding for fusedRNN kernel for CPU, this one is on our list. Once the tuning and testing is done, we will propose a PR.
We have been using deepspeech as the benchmark workload, we will also take your workloads (Word Language Model) and sequence labeler for benchmark.
Do you have any publicly available dataset for mini_sequence_labeler, or the input size for this workload? It would be easier for performance tuning if we knew the input size range.
